name: Charlotte Katakuri
text: [On Play] Put up to 1 Character with a cost of 8 or less on the top or bottom of its owner's Life Area face-up.

effect.text: Put up to 1 Character with a cost of 8 or less on the top or bottom of its owner's Life Area face-up.

meta.notes: Rarity 'C' is confirmed from the bottom right corner of the card.
